summary: these are some of the main characters from a new story i'm working on called "The Sorcerer's Intern". it's based loosely off of...
caption:
these are some of the main characters from a new story i’m working on called “The Sorcerer’s Intern”. it’s based loosely off of “The Sorcerer’s Apprentice”, and by loosely i mean it’s basically just the title and nothing else. i’m really going in on planning this one, but i wanted to doodle the main characters just to get a sort of loose feel of what they might look like in development. these are loose doodles, so these designs aren’t set in stone, though i do like how they came out.

read more about the story!


the drawings here are of the three main characters, and the three most integral to the central story so far.

taz is the intern from the title, taking on the place as the apprentice from the original story. she’s a thirteen year old girl with an innate sense of magic and power because of her bloodline and her status as the reincarnation of the famous wizard merlin. despite being a super powerful sorcerer, she’s a slacker and a troublemaker, which is why she’s forced to get a job at the Enchanted Emporium (Johann’s store), where she’s supposed to learn diligence and the value of hardwork. even though she’s a teenaged slacker, she’s still an excitable and naive kid who gets excited by things like magic lamps and dragons and so forth.

johann is her opposite, taking on the title of the sorcerer in the title. he is a bitter old sorcerer who is long immune to the wonders of the magical world. he’s cynical and tired and not too happy to hire taz at first, though he realizes that if he takes her on as an intern/apprentice, she’ll take over the store so he can finally leave the town and start a new life doing whatever he wants. he was the most talented sorcerer of his generation, though times have changed, leaving him jaded and cynical.

that’s all i have so far, but this is all a wip so some things might change later!

summary: A wip. Wanna draw so much shit but what is energy or sleep, not like havin hallucinations make drawin hard or anything.  Half a...
caption:
A wip. Wanna draw so much shit but what is energy or sleep, not like havin hallucinations make drawin hard or anything. 

Half a nerve away from crushing energy pills and puttin them in energy drinks because nothings working on this piece of shit body [and lunesta seems to be good for nothing but being kinda high for thirty minutes then making everything taste bad after]

summary: There's an expression on my language that is "tomar vergonha na cara". It's means "taking shame on the face", basically when you...
body:
There’s an expression on my language that is “tomar vergonha na cara”. It’s means “taking shame on the face”, basically when you neglect something and then you get ashamed enough so you’ll do it. That’s me with posting it.

Hello… it has been some time.

blog.name: lycantober
blog.title: Night of the Lycantober
blog.description:
Blog is now OPEN for October only.
This is a monthly blog dedicated to the werewoofers. Started this on DeviantArt as my own challenge.
I now will allow others to post werewolf-related pics on this blog. But before you do. Please read the rules.
NoTL Rule Guidelines
•	I will only accept Werewolves or Werewolf-esqe demons. 
•	Half Werewolves are ok such as Werepires. As long they have the power of the moon beast. 
•	No Werebeast, that includes Werehogs; I don’t honestly think Sonic is a werewolf since there is no lycanthropy connections. But they will deserve their own month/list. 
•	No demons that are already canines or other animals, they honestly don’t need to be werewolves.
•	I will only allow blood and gore.
•	No Fetish-related themes. I am not comfortable of making your fantasy on my page. 
•	NO sexual themes/NSFW related. It is FORBIDDEN my page >:(
•	No Religious themes. I’m not bashing on the topic as I am Catholic myself, I don’t encourage to upset others who are against…. well…monsters and demons.
•	No hate related topics.
•	No Political topics. This is a hate and drama-free event I do.
•	The Eclipse or Blood Moon Edition is only exclusive to certain characters of mine. If you have a character that should be part of BL, Note me why.
•	Failure to follow or read the rules, I have the right to refuse to draw your characters.
I also take part of Inktober as well, so if you’ll be seeing my ink works of werewolf related pic.
I can't promise that I will be doing this daily or getting all the characters. But fear not, if your characters didn't make it for the month, I’ll make a list for their appearance next October.
 Once October is done, I will not accept any post and request.
If you have any questions, just drop an Ask; And will answer your questions.
Let the beast unleash!

summary: Even a man who is pure in heart and says his prayers by night, may become a wolf when the wolfbane blooms and the autumn moon is...
caption:
Even a man who is pure in heart and says his prayers by night, may become a wolf when the wolfbane blooms and the autumn moon is bright.
                      ~quote from The Wolf Man 1941 and 2010

Alright I know I had previously posted this one before. But I forgot that this was originally going to be for Lycantober, so screw it. For those who are new, Bowser, Donkey Kong and Young Link are Chibi Teddiami’s pack. As their werewolf forms are part of her story.

More Night of the Lycantober

www.deviantart.com/chibi-tediz…

NotWL and Werewolf Bowser © Franchesca Huerta aka Chibi-Tediz

Bowser © Nintendo

Please do not use any of my characters or my work without my prior permission.If so, you will be warned. Reblogging is OK.
